For example, Lake Image Systems improved their Discovery Multiscan3 software to achieve higher image capture rates and processing speeds. These capabilities mirror the precision quality control seen historically in camera manufacturing, where Leitz used specialized equipment like collimators to check lens flange squareness and projection tests to verify lens definition and focusing accuracy.
